r without a beast form... we meet briefly and I started the process to take=

hat your were as if you was on fire? Your frame color were Golden, red and =
oragne and this "said the femme while she touched glenty his chest" looked =
like real flames."

"Why are you so agitate when I mention it?"she said whi=
le she looked carefully at his eyes as if she liked to ponder if he was lyi=
ng her

Nightlight didnt liked to admit it but all her unfortunate adventur=

the true.
